wiki_components.text: Primary ore for energy system components.
Found in the Overworld between Y=0 and Y=50
Deepslate variant generates below Y=0
Smelt into Simplunium Ingots for crafting
Used to create: Batteries, Generators, Machines, Tools
Primary ore for energy system components.
Found in the Overworld between Y=0 and Y=50
Deepslate variant generates below Y=0
Smelt into Simplunium Ingots for crafting
Used to create: Batteries, Generators, Machines, Tools
Mechanization Integration Item
Requires Mechanization datapack to be installed for recipes to function properly
Mechanization Integration Item
Requires Mechanization datapack to be installed for recipes to function properly
A diagnostic tool for energy systems.
Hold in your offhand to automatically scan machines when looking at them.

lore.text: Provides you the ability to instantly
break cables and rotates machines while sneaking

wiki_components.text: Essential tool for energy system maintenance.
Sneak + Right Click: Rotate machines
Instantly breaks cables for easy reconfiguration

lore.text: Unlocks a blocked slot in a machine

wiki_components.text: Unlocks blocked machine inventory slots.
Some machines may have locked slots that require this tool to access (e.g. Pulverizer).

lore.text: Allows you to switch batteries states
[Right click on a battery to switch]

wiki_components.text: Controls battery input/output modes.
Modes: Input Only, Output Only, Both
Right-click on batteries to cycle modes
Basic machine block for energy systems.
Used as a base for most machines and generators
Basic energy storage device.
Stores up to 10,000 kJ
Modes: Input Only, Output Only, Both (use Battery Switcher)
Breaking the battery preserves stored energy
Balances energy storage with adjacent simple batteries
Advanced energy storage device.
Stores up to 25,000 kJ
Modes: Input Only, Output Only, Both (use Battery Switcher)
Breaking the battery preserves stored energy
Balances energy storage with adjacent advanced batteries
Elite energy storage device.
Stores up to 50,000 kJ
Modes: Input Only, Output Only, Both (use Battery Switcher)
Breaking the battery preserves stored energy
Balances energy storage with adjacent elite batteries
Basic water-powered generator.
Requires water to operate - fill the cauldron with water
Balances energy storage with adjacent cauldron generators
Fuel-burning energy generator.
Consumes any furnace fuel to generate energy
High-output redstone generator.
Advanced generator powered by redstone dust and blocks
Heat-powered energy generator.
Must be placed directly adjacent to lava to operate
Balances energy storage with adjacent heat generators
Altitude-dependent wind generator.
Higher altitude increases energy generation
(0 kW at y=50, 2 kW at y=60, ..., 20 kW at y=150)
Daylight-powered generator.
Requires direct sunlight to operate
Balances energy storage with adjacent solar panels
Electric-powered smelting machine.
Smelts items using electricity instead of fuel (1.5x faster)
Advanced electric smelting station.
Faster and more efficient than electric furnace (8x faster)
Electric-powered brewing station.
Brews potions using electricity (8x faster)
Ore processing and grinding machine.
Grinds ores into dusts for increased yields
Vertical transport system for players.
Sneak on top to teleport to an elevator placed below
Jump on top to teleport to an elevator placed above
Maximum distance: 72 blocks
Basic energy transmission cable.
Connects energy generators to machines and batteries
Improved energy transmission cable.
Upgraded cable for higher energy throughput
High-capacity energy transmission cable.
Top-tier cable for maximum energy transfer
Item transport cable.
Connects machines and storage for item transfer
Requires both Servo Extractor and Servo Inserter
Item extraction servo-mechanism.
Extracts items from containers when placed on valid output faces
Must be connected to Basic Item Cable for item transport
Item insertion servo-mechanism.
Inserts items into containers when placed on valid input faces
Must be connected to Basic Item Cable for item transport
